marklogic.body: Clearly you are choosing to understand what you want to understand.Â I didn't say they would never be ready; I said they aren't ready to carry the company yet. Their builds just started, and like all builds, they are somewhat rushed. It takes time to establish a career and Gain a "Top Spot", even in "Scripted events", the writing has to be right and the character has to step into a role that is enough to be the face of the company, or one of its main faces. That when you think WWE, you think of those names. Most people still think: Austin/Rock/HBK when they think WWE. Not "Daniel Bryan/Sheamus/Ziggler." They might, in time, if they get good angles and continue with good matches. But they aren't there yet.
